data.title: Christmas Cross Stitch Pattern
meta_keywords: Glad Tidings - Christmas Cross Stitch Pattern
data.meta_description: Lindy Stitches Glad Tidings - Christmas Cross Stitch Pattern. Cross stitch pattern from Lindy Stitches featuring two colorful and classic Christmas patterns fea
data.text:
Cross stitch pattern from Calico Confectionery featuring beautiful lettering, stitch a vintage-look Christmas greeting and ornament in Victorian shades of red, black and tree green.

Pattern is stitched on 16 ct Tea-Dyed aida using DMC floss. Stitch count is 153w x 66h."When you think your faith has failed tou, all your hopes and dreams are gone, listen for the angels voice that whispers 'Just hold on'"

Model stitched on 28ct White Opalescent Lugana provided Wichelt Imports (1/4 of a yard, 18" X 26"). Requires 7 colors of... Read moreCross stitch pattern from Calico Confectionery featuring a beautiful little Angel of Peace evoking the sentiments of the old hymn!

Pattern is stitched on 16 ct Touch of Peach Aida using DMC floss. Stitch count is 116 x 68.This pattern from By The Bay Needleart features Adam and Eve on temptation hill.

The model was stitched over 2 threads on 32 Ct. Star Sapphire linen with Weeks Dye Works and DMC floss. Stitch Count: 74 x 147. Finished size: 4.6" x 9.2".Cross stitch pattern from Mirabilla featuring an archangel.

Note: (DMC 946) should be DMC 948

T symbols on the neck should be DMC 758, or the L symbol"Glad Tidings" - Stitch Count: 45x41. Design Size: 3" x 3" "Goodwill to all" - Stitch Count: 51x51. Design Size: 4" x 4" "Great Joy" - Stitch Count: 65x37. Design Size: 5" x 3" Models stitched on 32 Ct. Slate - Hand-Dyed Fabrics by Stephanie (or fabric... Read more"Glory to God in the highest, and on Earth peace among men". Model stitched on 30ct. 18th Century Brown linen using DMC: 754 and 815. Crescent Colours: Antique Lace, Garden Trellis, Pea Pod and Brandied Pears. Stitch count: 72w x 119h. Finished size is approximately 4 1/2" x 8". Shown in The Family Tree Frame - Style: June, Finish: Fleamarket, Color: Icing, Size: 6" x 9.5"Cross stitch pattern from Primrose Cottage Stitches featuring three Christmas phrases - "Come let us adore him", "Peace on Earth", and "Silent night"!

All models stitched on 27 ct. Linda cloth using DMC thread. Stitch count for Silent Night: 58 x 44, Come Let Us Adore Him: 89 x 39, Peace on Earth: 59 x 28.Model stitched over two threads on 36 Ct. Wren linen by Picture this Plus using Weeks Dye Works floss, DMC and Gentle Art Sampler threads (or all DMC 3782, 221, 420, 610, 3799, 730). Stitch count 158x169. Cross stitch pattern from Kitty and Me featuring friendly angels in four themes!

Recommended fabric is white 14 count aida or perforated paper. Models stitched with DMC floss and Kreinik #4 braid. Stitch count: 69w x 76h each ornament. Finished size: 4.875" x 5.375" each ornament. Designed by Pamela Kellogg.Cross stitch pattern from Kitty and Me featuring the scripture "Do not grow weary in well doing, for in due season ye shall reap." - Galatians 6:9.

Stitched over 2 on 28 count vintage evenweave with your choice of The Gentle Art sampler threads or DMC floss. Stitch count: 98w x 144h. Finished size: 7" x 10.25". Designed by Pamela Kellogg.Cross stitch pattern from Stoney Creek Collection featuring three snowmen with the phrase "We believe in snow angels"!

Pattern is stitched on 28 ct Stoney Creek Clear Sky Dyed fabric using DMC floss with Stoney Creek buttons. Stitch count is 63w x 253h.

Stoney Creek Button SB455XS required.This whimsical Christmas Winter Angel can be framed or made into a little doll pillow. How To's to make the irregular shaped pillow included. Also included is a bonus redwork version with a little fox in the lower left of the design. A Miss Prim Bestseller.

Pattern is stitched on 32 ct... Read moreThis counted cross stitch pattern of cute, little, easy to stitch, Angels was created from beautiful Artwork copyright of Joni Prittie. 121w x 146h total, each design is approx 65w x 75h. Only full cross stitches are used in this pattern. It is a black and white symbol pattern.

Model is stitched on 14 count White aida using DMC threads.Cross stitch pattern by Joan Elliott featuring 6 designs of little angels decorating for Christmas!

Stitch on 14 or 28 count fabric of your choice with DMC floss, Kreinik very fine braids, and Mill Hill beads. Stitch count: 49 x 49 each."She was the guiding light, the brightest star that night when the first Christmas was celebrated. Glittering and glowing in golds and silver, signifying that the King of Kings has been born."

The model was stitched on 14 Ct. blue/gray aida with DMC floss, Kreinik braid and Mill Hill beads. Stitch Count: 172W x 402H. Finished size: 12.29" x 28.71".This pattern from By The Bay Needleart features a heralding angel, cherub ornaments, lamb and star ornament, Joy, and Raphael Angel.

Model stitched on 32 ct linen of your choice using DMC floss, Gentle Arts thread, and Weeks Dye Works thread.

Stitch counts Holy Night Scene:... Read moreBring the joy and beauty of the holiday spirit to your mantel with this easy-to-personalize stocking featuring a festive angel. Inspirational in design, it is a reminder for the reason behind our treasured Christmas celebrations. It is a heavenly Christmas gift for faithful family members, friends,... Read more
